entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 12:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -38.3°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Blowing snow at times late this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
